pd.p: The width of the encoding frame (px). The width of the encoding frame (px). 用于衡量编码质量，以长 × 宽表示，默认值为 640 × 360。 It is used to measure encoding quality, expressed in length × width, and the default value is 640 × 360. 用户可以自行设置分辨率。 The user can set the resolution by himself.
Video encoding frame rate. Video encoding frame rate. The default value is 15. The default value is 15.

plentry.pd: The minimum frame rate of the video. The minimum frame rate of the video. The default value is -1. The default value is -1.

pd.p: The video encoding bitrate (Kbps). The video encoding bitrate (Kbps).

你可以根据场景需要参照下表手动设置你想要的码率。 You can refer to the table below to manually set the bit rate you want according to the needs of the scene. If the video bitrate you set is beyond a reasonable range, the SDK sets it within a reasonable range. If the video bitrate you set is beyond a reasonable range, the SDK sets it within a reasonable range. 你也可以直接选择如下任意一种模式进行设置： You can also directly select any of the following modes to set:

ul.li: : (推荐) 标准码率模式。 : (Recommended) Standard bit rate mode. In this mode, the bitrates differ between the interactive live streaming and communication profiles: `COMMUNICATION` profile: The video bitrate is the same as the base bitrate. `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profile: The video bitrate is twice the base bitrate. In this mode, the bitrates differ between the interactive live streaming and communication profiles: `COMMUNICATION` profile: The video bitrate is the same as the base bitrate. `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profile: The video bitrate is twice the base bitrate.

:适配码率模式。 : Adaptation rate mode. The bitrate remains the same regardless of the channel profile. The bitrate remains the same regardless of the channel profile. If you choose this mode in the `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profile, the video frame rate may be lower than the set value. If you choose this mode in the `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profile, the video frame rate may be lower than the set value.

pd.p: Agora 在通信和直播场景下采用不同的编码方式，以提升不同场景下的用户体验。 Agora uses different encoding methods in communication and live broadcast scenarios to improve user experience in different scenarios. the `COMMUNICATION` profile prioritizes smoothness, while the `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profile prioritizes video quality (requiring a higher bitrate). the `COMMUNICATION` profile prioritizes smoothness, while the `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profile prioritizes video quality (requiring a higher bitrate). 所以声网推荐将该参数设置为 。 Therefore, Agora recommends setting this parameter to.

row.entry: One million users One million users
One million users One million users
The subsequent 10 minutes: 240 × 180 The subsequent 10 minutes: 240 × 180
The initial 10 minutes: 640 × 360 The initial 10 minutes: 640 × 360
The initial 10 minutes: 640 × 360 The initial 10 minutes: 640 × 360
Video from D: 1280 × 720 Video from D: 1280 × 720
Video from D: 1280 × 720 Video from D: 1280 × 720

pd.note: The base bitrate in the video profile table applies to the communication profile. The base bitrate in the video profile table applies to the communication profile. Generally speaking, a live stream requires a higher bitrate to ensure high-video quality. Generally speaking, a live stream requires a higher bitrate to ensure high-video quality. Agora recommends to achieve this through the setting mode. 声网推荐通过设置 模式来实现。 You can also directly set the bit rate value to the reference bit rate value × 2. 你也可以直接将码率值设为基准码率值 × 2。

pd.p: The minimum encoding bitrate (Kbps). The minimum encoding bitrate (Kbps).

The SDK automatically adjusts the encoding bitrate to adapt to the network conditions. The SDK automatically adjusts the encoding bitrate to adapt to the network conditions. Using a value greater than the default value forces the video encoder to output high-quality images but may cause more packet loss and hence sacrifice the smoothness of the video transmission. Using a value greater than the default value forces the video encoder to output high-quality images but may cause more packet loss and hence sacrifice the smoothness of the video transmission. That said, unless you have special requirements for image quality, Agora does not recommend changing this value. That said, unless you have special requirements for image quality, Agora does not recommend changing this value.
pd.note: This method applies only to the `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profile. This method applies only to the `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profile.

plentry.pd: Video output orientation modes. Video output orientation modes.
Video degradation preferences when the bandwidth is a constraint. Video degradation preferences when the bandwidth is a constraint. For details, see . For details, see .

pd.p: Sets the mirror mode of the published local video stream. It only affects the video that the remote user sees. Sets the mirror mode of the published local video stream. It only affects the video that the remote user sees. See . See .
pd.note: Disable mirror mode. Disable mirror mode.
